foods.lowercaseDescription: mini pizza with pepperoni kit

foods.ingredients: PIZZA CRUST: ENRICHED FLOUR* (WHEAT FLOUR*, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), WATER, CANOLA OIL*, CANE SUGAR*, WHOLE GRAIN FLOUR* (WHOLE WHEAT FLOUR*, WHOLE RYE FLOUR*, WHOLE SPELT FLOUR*, WHOLE BARLEY FLOUR*, WHOLE RICE FLOUR*, WHOLE QUINOA FLOUR*, WHOLE AMARANTH FLOUR*), YEAST, SEA SALT, ENZYMES. TOPPING: OW MOISTURE PART SKIM MOZZARELLA CHEESE (PARTTLY NONFAT MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, CALCIUM CHLORIDE, ENZYMES), WATER, TOMATO PASTE*, COOKED SEASONED PEPPERONI+ (PORK, WATER, LESS THAN 2% SEA SALT, DEXTROSE, RICE STARCH, PAPRIKA, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, SPICES, SUGAR, VINEGAR, NATURAL FLAVORS), CARROT*, ONION*, RED BELL PEPPER*, SWEET POTATO*, KALE*, CELLULOSE, SEA SALT, SPICES*, GARLIC*, FLAVOR (SUNFLOWER OIL, NATURAL FLAVOR).
foods.allHighlightFields: Ingredients: PIZZA CRUST: ENRICHED FLOUR* (WHEAT FLOUR*, NIACIN, IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC

foods.description: NEWMAN'S OWN, THIN & CRISPY PIZZA, UNCURED PEPPERONI
foods.lowercaseDescription: newman's own, thin & crispy pizza, uncured pepperoni
foods.ingredients: MULTIGRAIN CRUST (WHEAT FLOUR, WATER, VEGETABLE OIL [CANOLA OIL, PURE OLIVE OIL], FLAXSEED, YEAST, SUGAR, SALT, WHOLE OAT FLOUR), SAUCE (TOMATOES [DICED TOMATOES, TOMATO JUICE], WATER, TOMATO PASTE, EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL, RED WINE VINEGAR, SALT, SUGAR, SPICES, GARLIC*, ONION*), LOW-MOISTURE PART-SKIM MOZZARELLA CHEESE (PASTEURIZED PART-SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES), UNCURED PEPPERONI NO NITRATE OR NITRITE ADDED EXCEPT THAT WHICH NATURALLY OCCURS IN SEA SALT AND CELERY JUICE CONCENTRATE (PORK AND BEEF, SEA SALT, NATURAL SPICES, EVAPORATED CANE JUICE, LACTIC ACID, STARTER CULTURE, NATURAL FLAVORINGS [INCLUDING CELERY JUICE CONCENTRATE], OLEORESIN OF PAPRIKA), PARMESAN CHEESE (PASTEURIZED PART-SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT AND ENZYMES), PARSLEY*.
foods.allHighlightFields:
Brand Owner: Newman's Own, Inc.
Ingredients: PEPPERONI NO NITRATE OR NITRITE ADDED EXCEPT THAT WHICH NATURALLY OCCURS IN SEA SALT AND CELERY JUICE
